# Custom Instructions for Copilot

1. don't add any icons in the code
2. don't make nested try,  exception blocks
3. don't guess the data format, if you are not sure choose one format to go along with
4. don't guess the file location, if you are not sure choose one locatoin to go along with
5. don't import modules in anywhere other than the top of the files
6. always import modules directly, no try and catch for modules
7. explain your changes and your code
8. don't show diff of the code, just the code
9. don't add commented out code at the end of the file
